title: Adani Total Gas currently has 1,212 EV charging points, work is on for another 740: CEO
description: AdTotal Gas Ltd's CEO Suresh Mangalani announced on Monday that the company's total EV charging points have risen to 1,212 units by the end of June 2024. Additionally, there are over 740 EV charging points under various stages of construction.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
